ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:38:26 [Issue ID 4000-139353] urn:comicvine:4000-139353 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 10:54:23. [Issue ID 407216]
ComicInfo.Summary: Alexander Crane is still reeling from his journey to the strange world of Abaddon, but the locals don't seem to be too sympathetic. Before long, he finds himself caught between a gang of vampire bikers, a small blue fairy with a real attitude problem, and a group of soldiers just like the ones who tracked him down on Earth. It doesn't take long for the local Dwarven Police Department to arrive to break up the squabble. Meanwhile, on Earth, we learn more about the bizarre team of rag tag magicians trying to stop the ARCHEAN from capturing Alex. If they're going to do so, one of their most powerful allies will have to go to Abaddon to stop him!
ComicInfo.Title: Lost in Abaddon Chapter Three of Five
